meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or consisting of fat.
meanings.sent1: The adipous tissue stored energy for the body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that an adipous diet could lead to health issues.
meanings.sent3: The adipous cat struggled to fit through the small pet door.
meanings.sent4: The adipous clouds in the sky seemed to weigh down the atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The adipous cheeks of the baby made everyone want to pinch them.

meanings.definition: Having an excessive amount of fat.
meanings.sent1: She avoided wearing tight clothes to hide her adipous figure.
meanings.sent2: The adipous man decided to start exercising to improve his health.
meanings.sent3: The adipous penguin waddled slowly across the icy terrain.
meanings.sent4: The adipous wallet bulged with an abundance of receipts.
meanings.sent5: The adipous bear looked content as it lounged in the sun.
